body: I've experience block lag that suffocated me... Like turn the anti cheat off jesus it just makes everything worst (if the anti cheat is the case)
body_tagged: I've experience block lag that suffocated me... Like turn the anti cheat off jesus it just makes everything worst (if the anti cheat is the case)
title: Is it me or is the Anti Cheat Back on?

replies.body: Anti Cheat is off, the server is just really screwed up right now. Hit detection is bad even without Anti Cheat, players getting kicked because the "server went down". Idek
replies.body_tagged: Anti Cheat is off, the server is just really screwed up right now. Hit detection is bad even without Anti Cheat, players getting kicked because the "server went down". Idek

replies.body: Actually Anti Cheat was turned back on. However, I'm not sure if that is the cause of the problems. Either way I've forwarded this to the devs. :)
replies.body_tagged: Actually Anti Cheat was turned back on. However, I'm not sure if that is the cause of the problems. Either way I've forwarded this to the devs. :)

replies.body: At least Staff is trying. Better make it very laggy for a small amount of time and smooth for the rest than half laggy all the time.
replies.body_tagged: At least Staff is trying. Better make it very laggy for a small amount of time and smooth for the rest than half laggy all the time.

replies.body: I've been having the glitch where if someone hits me/If I hit them, they get returned back to hub. Anyone else experiencing this?
replies.body_tagged: I've been having the glitch where if someone hits me/If I hit them, they get returned back to hub. Anyone else experiencing this?
